tell application \Safari\" to return URL: tell application \Google Chrome\" to return URL of active tab of first window"
tell application \Safari\" to return nam: tell application \Google Chrome\" to return title of active tab of first window"

tell application \Safari\" to return URL:
tell application \System Events" 
 tell process "Microsoft Excel" 
 set thefile to value of attribute "AXDocument" of window 1 
 end tell 
 end tell"
tell application \Safari\" to return nam:
tell application \System Events" 
 tell process "Microsoft Excel" 
 set fileName to name of window 1 
 end tell 
 end tell"

tell application \Safari\" to return URL:
tell application \Xcode" 
 activate 
 tell front document to set fpath to its file as alias 
 set ctime to creation date of (info for fpath) 
 set thisfile to POSIX path of fpath 
 return thisfile 
 end tell 
 tell application "Xcode" to return"
tell application \Safari\" to return nam: tell application \Xcode\" \n set fileName to name of window 1 \n end tell"

tell application \Safari\" to return URL:
tell application \Finder" 
 set theWindow to window 1 
 set thePath to (POSIX path of (target of theWindow as alias)) 
 end tell"

tell application \Finder" 
 set theWindow to window 1

 end tell"
